application.ref: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

titleStmt.title: Stock Selection via Nonlinear Multi-Factor Models

affiliation.orgName: BZW Barclays Global Investors Advanced Strategies and Research Group

analytic.title: Stock Selection via Nonlinear Multi-Factor Models

abstract.p: This paper discusses the use of multilayer feed forward neural networks for predicting a stock's excess return based on its exposure to various technical and fundamental factors. To demonstrate the effectiveness of the approach a hedged portfolio which consists of equally capitalized long and short positions is constructed and its historical returns are benchmarked against T-bill returns and the S&P500 index.
